symc.name: SERVICE_ALL_ACCESS
symc.desc: Includes STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED in addition to all access rights in this table

symf.name: SERVICE_CHANGE_CONFIG
symf.desc: Required to call the ChangeServiceConfig or ChangeServiceConfig2 function to change the service configuration. Because this grants the caller the right to change the executable file that the system runs, it should be granted only to administrators

symf.name: SERVICE_ENUMERATE_DEPENDENTS
symf.desc: Required to call the EnumDependentServices function to enumerate all the services dependent on the service.

symf.name: SERVICE_INTERROGATE
symf.desc: Required to call the ControlService function to ask the service to report its status immediately

symf.name: SERVICE_PAUSE_CONTINUE
symf.desc: Required to call the ControlService function to pause or continue the service

symf.name: SERVICE_QUERY_CONFIG
symf.desc: Required to call the QueryServiceConfig and QueryServiceConfig2 functions to query the service configuration

symf.name: SERVICE_QUERY_STATUS
symf.desc: Required to call the QueryServiceStatus or QueryServiceStatusEx function to ask the service control manager about the status of the service. Required to call the NotifyServiceStatusChange function to receive notification when a service changes status.

symf.name: SERVICE_START
symf.desc: Required to call the StartService function to start the service

symf.name: SERVICE_STOP
symf.desc: Required to call the ControlService function to stop the service

symf.name: SERVICE_USER_DEFINED_CONTROL
symf.desc: Required to call the ControlService function to specify a user-defined control code
